document_data.name: Darsson
document_data.mainbody: '''Darsson'''The only other Halruaan Darsson used the name as a self-given patronym, after his father Dars. No information is given as to whether this Darsson is using his name as a patronym as well, or if there is any relationship to [[Darsson Spellmaker]]. was the captain of the [[Halruaa]]n [[skyship]] ''[[Stormsailer]]'' owned by the [[Datharathi]] as of {{yearlink|1374}}. He himself was a native of Halruaa, and a wizard of enough experience to control the skyship. He took [[Warian Datharathi]], [[Sevaera Datharathi]] and [[Zeltaebar Datharathi]] across the [[Golden Water]] on that year.{{cite book/Darkvision|146|15}}
